methods.name: getCanonicalHostName
methods.comment:
Gets the fully qualified domain name for this IP address or hostname.
 Best effort method, meaning we may not be able to return 
 the FQDN depending on the underlying system configuration.

throws.comment:
the forward lookup of the specified address 
 failed

return.comment:
the fully qualified domain name for this IP address, 
    or if the operation is not allowed/fails
    the original host name specified.
